definitions.text: a plumbing fixture that sprays water over you
examples: they installed a shower in the bathroom

definitions.text: washing yourself by standing upright under water sprayed from a nozzle
examples: he took a shower after the game
the game was interrupted by a brief shower

definitions.text: a sudden downpour (as of tears or sparks etc) likened to a rain shower
examples: a little shower of rose petals

definitions.text: someone who organizes an exhibit for others to see
a party of friends assembled to present gifts (usually of a specified kind) to a person
examples: her friends organized a baby shower for her when she was expecting

definitions.text: expend profusely; also used with abstract nouns

examples: The guests showered rice on the couple

definitions.text: take a shower; wash one's body in the shower
examples: You should shower after vigorous exercise
Meteors showered down over half of Australia
